body: @fruitMaster I really suggest picking up actual learning materials first before diving into doujins right away. Other platforms can help you better than me on that regard. Once youve spent considerable amount of time studying, maybe you can start with some of the oneshots that you've previously read in English, this time in Japanese. You won't find easy doujins to read, so it's better to read a story you already know instead. That way, you can focus on the actual texts and have the translation right away to check. That said, pls keep in mind of some things: (1)Eng translations are sometimes done poorly and you cant assess that as a beginner. (2)Doujins have a lot of sex lingos so tbh, these aren't good materials to start with. (3)Chances are this will still be a hard task for you in the end. So just consider this as a hobby rather than a part of your studying. Learning a language is long term investment so results won't always show up right away. Good luck!

Summary: Blonde worked as a model for a tourist association's advertisement poster. Everyone seem to like it but the teachers are naturally worried about this. However, Sensei (MC) may be an introvert but he digs Blonde's shit. He would often have this inner conflict within him as he battles his own horniness. Anyway, after school Blonde approaches MC and asks for a consultation. Apparently, a company wants to scout her as their model. Looks like her relationship with her mom is complicated so she wants MC to accompany her. As much as he was surprised by this turn of events, heck he wants to see more of Blonde's pics so he gave in. On the next scene, they did go as planned. But to MC's surprise, Blonde is actually being scouted to do Gravure stuff. He was obviously against it at first but asks Blonde is she really wants to do it. She said that she does, since she also wants to help her mom in ways she can. Sensei accepts but made it clear that if they make her do something NG or--
So, this is Ryoh-zoh's new series after Rarefure's completed project? So far, art is fantastic as always, and the female lead (FMC) is pretty cute. We'll have to see how the story progresses later.
